name: @rodrigocoliveira/agno-types
description: TypeScript types for Agno client libraries
author: rodrigocoliveira

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && bun build src/index.ts --outdir dist --format cjs --packages external --sourcemap=external && bun build src/index.ts --outdir dist --format esm --packages external --entry-naming '[name].mjs' --sourcemap=external && tsc -p tsconfig.build.json
scripts.dev: bun build src/index.ts --outdir dist --format esm --packages external --entry-naming '[name].mjs' --watch
